short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify harmful chemicals in consumables and cosmetics for pregnant women

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ingredients list in cosmetics and consumables is long. Taro scans through the ingredients and highlights if it has any toxic/harmful ingredients that should be avoided by pregnant women. 

With a curated list of chemicals to be avoided during pregnancy and breastfeeding phase, taro is an easy way for shoppers to identify safe products.

Currently works on Sephora and Target!
